effect: Changes Aegislash's form between Blade Forme (high Attack/Sp. Atk) and Shield Forme (high Defense/Sp. Def) based on the move used: offensive moves switch to Blade Forme, King's Shield switches to Shield Forme.
notes: Form change occurs before the move executes; stat changes are retained between formes. Critical for Aegislash's strategy, allowing it to pivot between offense and defense.
